basics.name: Jacques Levasseur
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Self-starter, leader and multitasker, striving to persistently exceed expectations.

work.summary: Senior developer tasked with leading a team in maintaining and creating systems to help meet new/existing business needs.
highlights: Oversaw the development of new internal websites to replace aging legacy systems.
Led a team in implementing new cutting edge software frameworks.
Implemented project management tools for better visibility of completed tasks across the team.

work.summary: Main developer tasked with maintaining and creating systems to help meet new/existing business needs.
highlights: Developed automated scripts to integrate internal systems with 3rd party software.
Maintained and updated internal legacy websites. Included adding/updating features to meet new business needs/requirements.
Lead meetings to gather requirements and discuss possible solutions.
Carried out testing of new features and scripts prior to their deployment.

work.company: Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry
work.summary: Part of a team of project managers and business analysts developing a replacement for an end of life legacy system.
highlights: Developed a macro to pre-process and error check source data files into a standardised file format for use by a corporate system.
Updated user documentation including documenting newly developed processes.
Maintained the project data model ensuring parity between the model and the physical database. Included updating model with any changes resulting from development.
Created test case naming convention as well as develop all possible system test cases.
Participated in team/client meetings for requirement gathering and solution development.
Carried out testing of application and processes.

work.summary: Tasked with upgrading an aging website to be more mobile friendly as well as add new features to improve the user experience.
highlights: Developed a responsive site using PHP to attract mobile users and improve SEO results.
Simplified navigation to enhance user experience for non tech savvy users.
Created a gallery, using PHP and MySQL, with filters to be able to sort and display images based on those criteria.
Created an admin page so that the company could upload pictures and select the tags for those pictures.
